ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Where to go
ygData.msgSnippet: Su wrote: I want to find something I can solo that won t kill my faction with my DE kin but won t ruin any good faction i ve earned with the good guys. Any
ygData.messageBody:
Su wrote: "I want to find something I can solo that won't kill my faction
with my DE kin but won't ruin any good faction i've earned with the good
guys. Any suggestions?"

Check out The Overthere in Kunark (see EQ Atlas if you are unfamiliar with
getting there.) There's a bank and places to sell for dark races, along
with great exp at the Skyshrine entrance ramp. Just find pick-up group(s)
in the area and you'll soar to 34 in no time.

~Caerwyn
Ranger of 16 Seasons
Servant of Tunare
Fironia Vie
